name: Neverwinter
attacked: You are without honor. Your defeat will be my pleasure.
defeated: This only happened because I was Mana hosed!
introduction: Walk in the light and you may survive.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: Perhaps we can come to some arrangement.

name: Waterdeep
declaringWar: Your continue existence is an embarrassment to all leaders everywhere! You must be destroyed!
attacked: Curse you! You are beneath me, son of a donkey driver! I will crush you!
defeated: You mongrel! Cursed be you! The world will long lament your heinous crime!
introduction: Peace be on you! I am Danius, the great Kasian king  ... but I suppose you knew that.
tradeRequest: In my endless magnanimity, I am making you this offer. You agree, of course?

name: Baldurs Gate
declaringWar: The world will be more beautiful without you. Prepare for war.
attacked: Fool! You will soon regret dearly! I swear it!
defeated: You have won, congratulations. My palace is now in your possession, and I beg that you care well for the peacock.
introduction: Welcome foreigner, I am Harun Al-Rashid, Caliph of the Arabs. Come and tell me about your empire.

name: Dwarves
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills

name: Wood Elves
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: High Elves
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Pirate Kingdom
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: The Regiment
declaringWar: It's nothing personal. There is a bounty on your head that we intend to collect.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Alas, the fortunes of war are in your favor...

name: The Black Hand
declaringWar: Death comes to all, but you will rise again ... as my servent.
attacked: You wish to destroy me, but you only bring me more servents.
defeated: Defeated, yes. But for me death is but a new beginning.

name: Dervish
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...
